data: q6h, for duration of Dexamethasone for BPD treatment

Optimal dosage and duration has not been established. Exposure to systemic steroids should, where possible, be minimized. This treatment should be reserved for critically ill ventilator-dependent infants after consultation with the attending Neonatologist. Avoid using simultaneously with NSAIDs
Ensure conversation with parents by provider about administration of dexamethasone has been completed
